title: Power plants may be set up at coal pitheads to cut costs
description: A decision in this regard was taken after inter-ministerial consultations between the ministries of coal, power and railways which were anchored by the NITI Aayog, the official told ET. The coal ministry is in discussions with the power ministry and the Assam and Madhya Pradesh governments for two such plants near Coal India mines, according to the official.
